```
Problem 2

Find: (\w+),\s*( \w+),\s* (\w+.*)
Replace: \2 \1 \3

#Takes one or more consecutive word characters followed by a period and 
then 0 or more spaces and then a second group of one or more consecutive word characters followed by a period and one or more spaces followed by a third group of non-consecutive word characters....and changes the order, so that group 2 as delimited by parentheses is first in line, number 1 is second, and number 3 is still third. 

Find: ^\w+,\s*\w+,\s*(\w+\s*)+$
replace: \2 \1 (\3)
`````
